carouselNetworksDescription: Here you can report issues or ask for support regarding the cabled and wirless networks on campus.
carouselElearningDescription: Here you can create areas for your courses, ask for support regarding the e-learning platform or report issues.
carouselOnlineFormsDescription: Request access to implement surveys for research projects or curricular units.
carouselHelpdeskDescription: Ask for in-person support regarding any issue you may have with the services provided by STIC.
